aboutMe.summary:
An experienced .NET web application developer, who has been working in several enterprise applications since 2015, with a fine knowledge of Database Design, Design Pattern, Object-Oriented Programming.
Solid experience on ASP.NET Web Form and ASP.NET MVC technologies, as well as JavaScript, Twitter Bootstrap and responsive web design. Have knowledge about distributed programming with WCF, Web APIs and efficient development modal like Agile-Scrum. English skill is fluent with IELTS 6.0, certificated since April 2016.
Good in teamwork and communication, like to help and learn from other members and tend to work well within a group.

employmentHistory.title: Top UK's Recruiter Company - Reed
employmentHistory.description:
For a long time, since 1995, the company has been the best recruiter platform in the United Kingdom. Now they are still one of the best.
The company provides a service which connect both the recruiters and the people looking for a job in the most efficient way.
Have been running for a long time, the old service is no longer catchup with the latest technologies and the latest business domains, therefor no longer able to provide the best service for their customers.
A development team is founded to help improve the company's service to be more efficient and able to match with the latest requirements of the new era. The new development team has 20+ memebers with 2 sub-teams:
- Recruiter: handing the business for the recruiter to find proper, relevant and suitable candidates
- Jobseeker: handing the business that allows the people to find the correct jobs and companies that they are looking for
employmentHistory.responsibility:
As one of the experienced developers with fluent English communication skill, I was put into the Jobseeker team to handle the core business domain directly with the custsomer.
- Communicate with customer to get clear requirements
- Breakdown customer's requirements to tickets and sub-tasks
- Refinement and planning for sprints
- Update code according to the ticket's requirements, for the tickets wich are assigned to me
- Help and support other team members for their tickets, and for communication with customer
- Perform unit testing
- Sometime reviewing tickets are done by other team members
employmentHistory.technologies:
- ASP.NET MVC
- REACT, Knockout JS, HTML, CSS, Twitter Bootstrap
- Dapper, NHibernate
- Entities Framework
- Web APIs
- SQL SERVER
- Design patterns

employmentHistory.title: Top Singapor's Customs - Cargo Community Network (CCN)
employmentHistory.description:
The customer is a Singapore company which provides cargos shipment and management system for the air cargos industry. Their service is used by many Customs around the world.
Their service allows the customers to:
- Easily connect to all supply chain stakeholders
- Access to comprehensive portfolio of advanced IT solution
- Simplify the work in cargos management (shipment details, shipment status, …)
- Efficient in customs security compliance
- Business performance analytics
employmentHistory.responsibility:
- Study Functional Design Specification
- Produce Technical Design Specification, Design Input
- Coding Web API.
- Coding WCF service.
- Coding business logic.
- Create store procedures.
- Coding Unit test script and integrate module.

- C# .NET
- ASP.NET Webform
- Team Foundation Server 2012
- HTML, Twitter Bootstrap, Telerick
- JavaScript, Query
- SQL Server 2012, 2014
- XAML, XML
